name: OCKAnyVersionableTask
desc: A task you can version and persist in a database.

items.name: var effectiveDate: Date
items.desc: The date when the current version of the object begins to take precedence over the previous version.

items.name: var localDatabaseID: OCKLocalVersionID?
items.desc: A unique identifier used by the local database.

items.name: var nextVersionID: OCKLocalVersionID?
items.desc: A database-generated property that uniquely identifies the next version of an object or value.

items.name: var previousVersionID: OCKLocalVersionID?
items.desc: A database-generated property that uniquely identifies the previous version of an object or value.
